item.description:
Hi,
Looking for some fun tonight!
There is a good band playing at The Grog starts at 9pm.


Directions:From I-95: Take Exit 57, Route 113 (West Newbury/Newburyport) and head east toward Newburyport. After about 2 miles take a left on Green Street (there will be a blinking yellow light and the courthouse will be on the right). Go to the end of Green Street and turn right on to Merrimac Street. After passing the Firehouse Center for the Performing Arts on the left, bear right on to State Street and take the second left - Middle Street. The Grog is on the left and our parking lot is immediately adjacent to the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture. I am 5'9" and have long dark brown hair. I'll have on jeans and a purple top.
item.why: I know this is last minute and not Mtn Bike related but I thought the more the merrier!
item.name: Music and Mingling at THE GROG in NBPT!
